scripts.kafka-native-compose: docker compose -f kafka-native-compose.yml up -d && node test-kafka-native-compose.js || docker compose -f kafka-native-compose.yml down
scripts.kafka-native-schema-registry-compose: docker compose -f kafka-native-cp-schema-registry.yml up -d && node test-kafka-native-cp-schema-registry-compose.js || docker compose -f kafka-native-cp-schema-registry.yml down
